content.title: Financial Assistance for Try Cycle to Workers and their Dependents - Haryana Labour Welfare Board
content.details: This scheme provides financial assistance for the purchase of try cycles to workers and their dependents.
benefits: Financial support for purchasing try cycles
eligibility: Must be a registered worker under the Haryana Labour Welfare Board
Dependents of registered workers are also eligible
content.application_process: Online application through the Labour Department Haryana website or Antyodaya-SARAL Portal.
documents_required: Proof of registration as a worker
